text: Ordered their Christmas menu and the selection was good and very authentic and fitting for a Christmas gathering. However, they approach it as a mini buffet and don’t usually provide food warmers. This caused our food to get cold very quickly. Turkey was quite tough and roasted beef was pretty bloody and the beef lasagna was a tad salty. The highlight was the Broccoli Au Gratin - the cheese was creamy and very tasty.
Always trust them for the best Christmas fare! One of the best turkey I’ve had!
Been ordering their turkeys since 2013. They come sliced and ready to go!
Poor quality food and service staff are curt and not helpful
